//: May be run directly by the user (mentioned in docs)
name: mmtune

mmtune.command: ! bash -c "reset_spi_serial.py 2>/dev/null; oref0_init_pump_comms.py; find monitor/ -size +5c | grep -q mmtune && cp monitor/mmtune.json mmtune_old.json; echo {} > monitor/mmtune.json; echo -n \"mmtune: \" && openaps report invoke monitor/mmtune.json; grep -v setFreq monitor/mmtune.json | grep -A2 $(json -a setFreq -f monitor/mmtune.json) | while read line; do echo -n \"$line \"; done"
